newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia's RTS-2 to quote hourly prices soon.
newsitem.headline: Russia's RTS-2 to quote hourly prices soon.

text.p: The Russian Trading System's lower-tier segment for less liquid stocks, RTS-2, plans to start quoting share prices hourly, and may do so as early as next week, said an official from the NAUFOR national brokers association.

Sergei Golovanyov said NAUFOR, which operates the RTS, a NASDAQ-like electronic trading system, had decided to publish RTS-2 data in the same format and way as the main RTS from April 7 or sooner and go on-line by May 1.
Also on April 7, the RTS index of 23 leading shares would be re-calculated to take into account changes in market capitalisation.
